name: BREAK ARTS II
description: Faster than anyone. Stronger than anyone. And more stunning. Customize your robot for “cyber battle racing” in a game that offers all the thrills of racing, battle, and customization. Online, Offline, Time-Attack... which mode will you dominate?!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1050 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
